content.summary: A Social platform which allows auditors, suppliers and food producers to collaborate with each other to solve the problems related to transparency and traceability in food supply chain. It seamlessly connects auditors , food growers , suppliers and retailers to collaborate among themselves using in built communication platform , message center and document storage to ensure best practice in growing , harvesting , transportation and storage are followed across their supply chains.
content.technology: Java (Spring, Solr, Hibernate), Neo4j, Redis, Javascript (Angular JS), Ruby and Rails(ROR) , Heroku, Twilio, PostgreSQL, AWS (EC2, S3, IAM), Python/Django

content.summary:
Over the last 7+ years, Metacube has helped IDC build the BuyerPulse Deals Database -it's an online platform offering tangible metrics that helps service providers, customers, and the financial community with lead generation, purchase decisions, penetrating into specific industry, market, country as well as partner monitoring.
The tool captures over 65,000 services contracts representing a combined value of over $3.5 trillion.
Metacube owns the complete engineering services for BuyerPulse Deals Database.
content.technology: Java (Spring MVC, Hibernate, SOLR), AngularJS, Python, Scikit-learn, NLTK, Stanford lib

content.summary: RRPF supports over fifty airlines around the world, from established flag carriers to the big airlines. Metacube develops and maintains their key engine sales and leasing platform with which they provide sale and leaseback finance to their customers. This in turn allows RRPF to help aircraft leasing companies extract the maximum residual value of their engines as a purchaser and lessor of their installed engines as well as provider of used engines for exchange.
content.technology: Salesforce, Web Rest API, OCR, Machine Learning, Intuitive UI

content.summary: Assurant is one of the world's premier global providers of warranty solutions and related benefits, with operations in more than 35. It is a single-source solution that provides underwriting, claims administration, and marketing expertise to some of the world's leading manufacturers, distributors, and retailers of consumer goods, as well as specialty insurance products and services for financial institutions.
content.technology: Salesforce, Apex, Visualforce, SLDS,Jquery, Drawloop Integration, Web Services, Reports, FFA package

content.summary: FinancialForce is the leading cloud ERP for the new services economy native to the Salesforce platform. Metacube has been working with FinancialForce.com since May, 2011 as their extended Enginnering team to make regular enhancement and maintenance of their various product offerings e.g. Professional Service Cloud, ERP Cloud, Order & Inventory Management etc.
content.technology: Salesforce Lightning Platform, Lightning Components, SLDS, Lightning UI, Communities

content.summary: IQVIA is the world's leading provider of market intelligence to the pharmaceutical and healthcare industries. It has Salesforce CRM, service cloud, contract management, professional service automation,CPQ implementation across its global sales, consulting and services organisations.
content.technology: Integrations with DocuSign, Integrations with SAP, Native Salesforce

content.summary: Salesforce.com's Trailhead platform is widely used by millions of users for Learning about Salesforce features in a fun and interactive way. This also includes their Certification program. Metacube team is working with Trailhead Technical Operations and Infrastructure team for Digital Transformation of these systems which can ensure great Trailblazer experience as well as scale with time. https://trailhead.salesforce.com/help
content.technology: Service Cloud, Lightning UI, Lightning Components, Lightning Out, Einstein Bot, Mulesoft, Experience Cloud

content.summary: Beam Suntory, Inc. is an American-founded, Japanese multinational company that produces alcoholic beverages. It is a subsidiary of Suntory, based in Osaka, Japan. It is the third largest producer of distilled beverages worldwide, behind Diageo and Pernod Ricard
content.technology: Salesforce (Marketing Cloud), Mulesoft, Drupal

content.summary: Development and enhancement of their product RefEdge which is a 100% native Salesforce product used for managing references within an enterprise
content.technology: SSalesforce Development (Sales Cloud, Community), Lightning Design System, Lightning Web Component

content.summary: Maintenance and Enhancement of their CTI Adapter for Salesforce, Activation Server, All-in-one Protector. Developed new products like Audio Link and Archive Providing Sales and after sales support
content.technology: Salesforce Development, .Net, Salesforce Lead Conversion & Service Cloud

content.summary: Tier1 Financial Solutions is a leader in global relationship management software for the financial services industry. Tier1 empowers the clients to increase productivity, reduce relationship risk and enhance customer ROI. Tier1 augments the Salesforce platform with a capital markets grade security engine, coverage management and accelerated web and mobile workflows to support the unique requirements of Research, Sales & Trading, Corporate & Investment Banking and Investment Management professionals. Trusted by more than 19,000 users worldwide, its flexible, scalable solutions empower collaboration, transparency and communication across the institutional financial ecosystem.
content.technology: The hybrid application is developed using Salesforce Mobile SDK, ExtJS and Native plugins for Android/iOS, Tier1 plugin framework and javascript

content.summary: Blackpurl is a premier Dealer Solutions Provider (DSP), and has an existing solution on the .Net platform. It has now partnered with Salesforce to deliver a next generation Dealer Management Software (DMS) solution on the Salesforce platform.
content.technology: Salesforce, Force.com, Bootstrap, AngularJS, Assembla, Git, Slack

content.summary: Jefferies is a diversified financial services company engaged in investment banking and capital markets, asset management and direct investing.Jefferies offers a full range of investment banking, equities, fixed income, asset and wealth management products and services.
content.technology: Lightening Platform, Apex, Tier1 Package, Mulesoft, Splunk, AutoRabit, Jira, Confluence

content.summary: Asperato is a one-time payment integration, meaning that as your business grows and adapts, so does Asperato. Asperato saves you the chore of having to log into multiple systems, anchoring all of your integrations and payment channels in one place, giving you a single view of everything. A simple approach that means you’re free to drive payment collections, rather than being caught up with admin and data. In a nutshell, Asperato helps Salesforce customers collect payments from all over the world.
content.technology: Salesforce, Java, AWS

content.summary: Chubb is the world's largest publicly traded property & casualty insurance company, serving consumers & companies of all sizes. Metacube is working on RPA and ML projects for them as part of an enterprise wide effrot to unlock efficiencies to the tune of $750 Million over a 5 year period.
content.technology: Workfusion, Sorocco, ML, AutoIT, Selenum, Quarkus, Apache Camel

content.summary: Vroom, Inc. is a New York City-based used car retailer and e-commerce company that lets consumers buy, sell, and finance cars online.
content.technology: Salesforce Development & Configuration, Aura, Apex, SOQL, Flow, Experience Cloud (Communities), Visualforce, Process Builders, Einstein (Basic), Integrations (DocuSign, Fedex, Shippo)

content.summary: Continuous provides an independent, API driven “logic engine” that any system can call to get how much the pricing, prorations will be for the various lifecycle events. This Product can be integrated with Sales, Service, CPQ and Billing System.
content.technology: Salesforce Managed Package Development, SOAP and REST APIs, APEX, LWC, Experience Cloud (Communities), Integrations.

content.summary: Spryker enables companies to create winning transactional business models in B2B, Enterprise Marketplaces, Unified Commerce and B2C. It is the most modern cloud native platform-as-a-service solution with over 100% year-over-year growth, headless, API based, enterprise-ready, and it's loved by Sales, Marketeers, and Developers worldwide. Spryker is built out of true innovation to create the most flexible and agile commerce software on the market.
content.technology: PHP (Symfony), ReactJS, AngularJS, API

content.summary: Stitch is a team of consultants delivers user-centered technology solutions for innovative clients.
content.technology: Salesforce Development & Configuration, Aura, Apex, SOQL, Flow, Experience Cloud (Communities), Visualforce, Process Builders, Einstein (Basic)

content.summary: AI-powered RevOps platform that guides reps in the moments that matters. Optimizes revenue operations, analyze what works best, and scales top performers with Revenue Science.
content.technology: Salesforce Platform, Workflows, Approval Processes, Browserstack, Jenkins, Selenium Webdriver, TestNG, Postman
